title: First Look: Fair Bicycle Drop Best UC Road is a Universally Compatible Offset Saddle Clamp
content:
Want to change your seated pedaling position but limited by proprietary seat posts? The Fair Bicycle Drop Best circumnavigates that issue with a 27mm offset clamp that can add a forward or a rearward offset.

Read the full article at First Look: Fair Bicycle Drop Best UC Road is a Universally Compatible Offset Saddle Clamp on Velo.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
